title: game keeps freezing
body: So my game keeps freezing and I'm getting VERY mad at it always losing lp, unable to use the legacy client, and having to wait on dodge queues that I never meant to dodge. It is annoying me pretty badly and I want someone to give me a tip of how to STOP the game freezing so I can play... I'm afraid to play another game or I might have to dodge to screen freezing. Is there anyway to stop this OR does anyone know when the client will stop crashing for legacy, either will help

replies.body:
It sounds like your issues stem from an *unstable connection* to our matchamking servers. This could be for a few different reasons, however, we've consolidated a list of steps that usually resolve these issues inside our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I recommend giving those a go.

Please let me know if this resolved the issue for you.
